name: react-vh
description: Save correct vh in root-variable and use it in CSS.
author: AndreasFaust

scripts.release:major: yarn build && git add . && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: yarn build && git add . && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: yarn build && git add . && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:dev: yarn build && git add . && git commit -m 'Do Beta-Release' && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm version 6.0.0-next.0 && npm publish --tag next
scripts.deploy: yarn next build && yarn next export && touch out/.nojekyll && gh-pages -t -d out
